products.name: Beef Longganisa
products.description: A flavorful twist on a Filipino classic, Joshua's Beef Longganisa brings rich, garlicky goodness to every bite. Made from premium beef and blended with traditional spices.

products.name: Beef Skinless
products.description: Joshua's Skinless Beef Longganisa is juicy, savory, and easy to cook. A perfect everyday choice for families who love big flavor in every meal.

products.name: Beef Tapa
products.description: Joshua's Beef Tapa is tender, marinated to perfection, and ready to cook. Packed with bold flavor and ideal for hearty meals.

products.name: Corned Beef
products.description: Joshua's Corned Beef is chunky, savory, and satisfying. Made with premium beef and seasoned with the perfect balance of spices.

products.name: Hamburger
products.description: Joshua's Beef Hamburger Patties are juicy and meaty, ideal for quick burgers or rice meals. A versatile must-have for every kitchen.

products.name: Chicken Bologna
products.description: A hearty and flavorful take on a classic! Our Chicken Bologna is made with finely ground chicken, perfectly seasoned for a smooth and satisfying bite. Great for sandwiches, breakfast meals, or as a snack on its own.

products.name: Chicken Embotido
products.description: Our Chicken Embutido is a Filipino-style meatloaf that's both festive and flavorful. Made from tender chicken meat, mixed vegetables, and seasonings, then wrapped and steamed to perfection. Just heat and serve!

products.name: Chicken Marinated
products.description: Ready to cook and full of flavor! Our Marinated Chicken is soaked in a special blend of herbs and spices, locking in taste and tenderness. Ideal for grilling, pan-frying, or oven-roasting—your next quick and tasty meal is ready in minutes.

products.name: Chicken Meatloaf
products.description: A comforting classic! Our Chicken Meatloaf offers a juicy, homestyle flavor in every slice. Ideal for quick lunches or dinner plates. Serve with mashed potatoes or rice for a complete meal.

products.name: Chicken Salami
products.description: Lean, flavorful, and deliciously spiced—our Chicken Salami is perfect for sandwiches, pizzas, or your favorite charcuterie boards. Made from quality chicken and seasoned just right.

products.name: Chicken Skinless-Longganisa
products.description: Skip the guilt but keep the flavor! Our Skinless Chicken Longganisa is savory-sweet, made with natural spices and no casing—just pure meaty goodness. A breakfast staple that's lighter and healthier.

products.name: Chicken Smoked Longganisa
products.description: Experience the bold, smoky twist on a classic Filipino favorite. Our Chicken Smoked Longganisa packs a flavorful punch with every bite—ideal for silog meals or as a tapa alternative.

products.name: Chicken Tempura
products.description: Crispy on the outside, tender on the inside. Our Chicken Tempura is made with juicy chicken fillets, coated in a light, golden batter. Great as a snack or meal centerpiece.

products.name: Chicken Tocino
products.description: Sweet, savory, and perfectly tender—our Chicken Tocino brings classic Filipino breakfast vibes to your table. Made from marinated chicken and cooked to juicy, caramelized perfection.

products.name: Muscle Ham
products.description: A premium, chunky ham made from choice cuts of pork, seasoned to perfection and glazed for a savory-sweet finish. This meaty ham is perfect for carving and serving as your show-stopping centerpiece. Every bite is tender, juicy, and loaded with festive flavor.

products.name: Pork or Chicken-Pearshaped_Ham
products.description: A family favorite, Joshua's Pear-Shaped Ham is available in Pork or Chicken variants — perfect for any taste preference. Smooth, compact, and easy to slice, this holiday ham delivers that classic Filipino sweetness, ideal for breakfast, sandwiches, or your noche buena table.

products.name: Roasted Ham
products.description: Savor the smoky aroma and traditional holiday taste of Joshua's Roasted Ham. Expertly cured and slow-roasted, this ham delivers a perfectly balanced flavor that's slightly sweet with a hint of smokiness. Serve it warm with your favorite sides or slice it cold for sandwiches and party platters.

products.name: Cheesedog Footlong
products.description: Get a taste of cheesy goodness in every bite with our Cheesedog Footlong – packed with flavor, made to satisfy! Perfect for merienda or quick bites on the go!

products.name: Cheesedog
products.description: Cheese + Hotdog = Perfect Combo! Our classic Cheesedog is bursting with creamy cheese and premium meat. One bite and you'll be hooked!

products.name: Premium Hotdog
products.description: Experience the rich, meaty flavor of our Premium Hotdog – your new go-to for any meal of the day!

products.name: Swak Hotdog
products.description: Swak sa Badyet, Swak sa Panlasa! Enjoy delicious flavor without breaking the bank with our Swak Hotdog – sulit na, masarap pa!

products.name: Pork Belly Bacon
products.description: Our pork belly bacon is thick-cut, naturally smoked, and perfectly marbled for that satisfying crunch and flavor. Great for breakfast plates, burgers, or as an indulgent topping for salads and pastas.

products.name: Pork Breakfast Sausage
products.description: Kick-start your day with juicy, savory pork breakfast sausages seasoned with a delicate blend of herbs and spices. Best served pan-fried and paired with eggs, pancakes, or rice.

products.name: Pork Canadian Style Bacon
products.description: Crafted from premium pork loin, this Canadian-style bacon offers a leaner alternative to traditional bacon—perfect for health-conscious eaters who still crave that classic cured flavor.

products.name: Pork Embotido
products.description: This savory meatloaf roll is packed with ground pork, carrots, raisins, and classic spices, wrapped and steamed to perfection. Serve it warm or chilled—either way, it's a festive favorite.

products.name: Pork Fresh Garlic Longganisa Alaminos Style
products.description: Enjoy the rustic, homemade taste of Alaminos-style longganisa—fresh, garlicky, and delightfully robust. These skinless sausages are perfect fried and paired with garlic rice and vinegar dip.

products.name: Pork German Franks
products.description: A versatile staple for hotdogs or gourmet sausage platters. These franks are lightly smoked and spiced for that classic European flavor loved by all ages.

products.name: Pork German Sausage
products.description: Made the traditional way, our German sausage offers bold seasoning with just the right amount of smokiness. Great for grilling, stews, or hearty sausage-and-mash meals.

products.name: Pork Hamonado
products.description: Our Pork Hamonado is tender pork marinated in pineapple and spices, then slow-cooked until sweet, savory, and perfectly glazed. Serve it with rice for a comforting Pinoy meal.

products.name: Pork Salami
products.description: Richly seasoned and expertly cured, our Pork Salami offers a bold, savory flavor in every bite. Perfect for sandwiches, platters, or as a gourmet snack.

products.name: Pork Skinless Longganisa
products.description: A Filipino favorite reimagined—our skinless pork longganisa delivers garlicky, slightly sweet notes with a juicy, tender bite.

products.name: Pork Tocino
products.description: Marinated in a signature sweet and savory glaze, our Pork Tocino caramelizes beautifully in the pan for a traditional Filipino breakfast experience.

products.name: Premium Pork Smoked Longganisa
products.description: Elevated with a subtle smoky aroma, this variant brings a robust flavor that sets it apart from traditional longganisa.

products.name: Special Pork Skinless Longganisa
products.description: A gourmet take on the classic—richer, meatier, and loaded with spices for a deeper, more satisfying flavor.

products.name: Tocino Honey Cured
products.description: Infused with natural honey, this tocino variant balances sweetness and umami, caramelizing beautifully when pan-cooked.

products.name: Longganisa De Cebu
products.description: Enjoy the rich, garlicky-sweet flavor of Cebu's iconic longganisa. Made from premium pork and traditional spices, this Filipino favorite brings island-style goodness to your breakfast table or any mealtime craving.

products.name: Pork Siomai
products.description: Soft, juicy, and bursting with flavor—Joshua's Pork Siomai is made from premium ground pork, carefully seasoned and wrapped in a tender yellow wonton wrapper. Each piece is crafted to deliver that authentic, home-style taste, whether steamed or pan-fried.
